channel.title: About on Yu Yamashita
channel.description: Recent content in About on Yu Yamashita

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hi, I’m Yu Yamashita! I’m a senior student at University of Tsukuba, where I’m part of the FusionCompLab. I want to study abroad in the future! Education University of Tsukuba, Japan. April 2018 - March 2022 College of Knowledge and Library Sciences, School of Informatics. Advisor: Atsuyuki Morishima. Research Interests Human-AI collaboration Skill domain transition Speed up Multi Agent Simulation using deep learning Publications Yu Yamashita, Shunsuke Shigenaka, Disuke Oba, and Masaki Onishi, “Estimation of Large-scale Multi Agent Simulation Results Using Neural Networks”, Special Interest Group on Society and Artificial Intelligence (SIG-SAI), Nov.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: yu.yamashita.2021b@mlab.info Mailing Address University of Tsukuba 221B, Baker Street London United Kingdom -- Social Github Linkdin Twitter
